mods.note: 3> No. / of 1859. P ublic W orks D epartment. 'i? MEMORANDUM. 1. Each of the Authorities whose names or official designations are noted above is to understand that the following Copy or Extract of Resolution (together with any papers that may be appended) is sent for his information or for his informa tion and guidance (as the case may be), and for the issue of such subsidiary orders as may appear necessary for giving effect to the views of Government. 2. It is also to be understood that a Copy or an Extract of the Resolution has been likewise furnished to all the Authorities whose names or official designations are prefixed. 3. The same number, as above, is affixed to each copy sent to different Authorities. 4. In Official Correspondence the number and date of the Secretary's Memorandum should be quoted, and not the date of the Government Resolution, h- H. YOUNG, Bombay Castle, / 6 J 1S59. location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Public Works Memorandum, no.1235 of 1859, to the Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The memorandum relates to maintenance arrangements for the Residency buildings in Bushire. The memorandum is a submission for sanction of a statement of the estimated costs for the three-yearly repairs to the Residency buildings. The statement of estimated costs (folio 9) is an identical copy of that sent earlier by the Resident to the Secretary to the Government of Bombay (folio 7).
